name: Namko
startIntroPart1: O Great leader Kenshiro Otaka, The Empire fell by the enemies. You did not. From exile, you forged Namko — a nation of wrath, built in ash.
startIntroPart2: Will the great leader Kenshiro Otaka lead our empire to it glory for other.
declaringWar: We will declare war on you.
defeated: We may have lose but will always will come back to reclaim what our!.
introduction: Hello welcome to Normalia and you.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, but we never forget about this.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
